gov.nasa.jpf.autodoc

Class NameUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.jpf.autodoc.NameUtils

  • public class NameUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to check file, archive and project names or normalizeName names.
    Author:
    Carlos Uribe

    • Method Detail

      • isFileClassName

        public static boolean isFileClassName(java.lang.String filename)
        Check if filename ends with .class extension and it is not a directory.

        Example: folder/MyFile.class is a valid name.
        MyClass is not a valid name.

      • isJarFilename

        public static boolean isJarFilename(java.lang.String filename)
        Check if filename ends with .jar extension and it is not a directory.

        Example: folder/MyArchive.jar is a valid name.
        MyArchive is not a valid name.

      • isZipFilename

        public static boolean isZipFilename(java.lang.String filename)
        Check if filename ends with .zip extension and it is not a directory.

        Example: folder/MyArchive.zip is a valid name.
        MyArchive is not a valid name.

      • isPckClassName

        public static boolean isPckClassName(java.lang.String classname)
        Check if package name is lowercase, is separated by dots and classname starts with capital letter. A class located in default package is invalid.

        Example: java.lang.Object is a valid name.
        MyClass is not a valid name.

      • isJPFProjectName

        public static boolean isJPFProjectName(java.lang.String project)
        Check if target contains 'jpf' and '-' but not file separators ('/' | '\') nor dot.

        Example: jpf-symbc is a valid name.
        eclipse-jpf is a valid name.
        myProject is not a valid name.

      • isBuildFolder

        public static boolean isBuildFolder(java.lang.String pathname)
        Check if pathname ends with 'build' and/or file separator ('/' | '\')

        Example: jpf-core\build is a valid name.
        /home/.jpf/jpf-aprop/build/ is a valid name.
        build.i is not a valid name.

      • isNameMangled

        public static boolean isNameMangled(java.lang.String classname)

      • normalizeName

        public static java.lang.String normalizeName(java.lang.String classname)
        Normalize non-standard named package classnames replacing separators for standard package dot separator.

      • normalizePath

        public static java.lang.String normalizePath(java.lang.String path)

      • getSeparator

        public static java.lang.String getSeparator()
